amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on America's National World War I Museum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3251 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3251 proposed by Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S6779-6780; text: CR S6779) To express the sense of Congress on America's National World War I Museum.
